transcript: the chief thing is not to forget the important thing I was thinking of. Yes, Na-tdsha, sabretache, oh, yes, yes! That's right!" And his head once more sank to his horse's neck. All at once it seemed to him that he was being fired at. "What? What? What? . . . Cut them down! What? . . ." said Rost6v, waking up.
